overview.title: Design
overview.text: The ultra-narrow body of Honor 8 with 2.5D glass, aluminium alloy offset and 3D grating effect will certainly attrack attention.

overview.title: Camera
overview.text: The camera is equipped with two sensors – RGB and black-white capturing with 1.25 um pixel size. Dual 12MP lenses increase the quality and detalization of the photos, making the images ultra-realistic. 3 types of focusing allow to make stunning macro shootings and photos even in low light conditions.

overview.title: 3D Fingerprint
overview.text: With the new 3D Fingerprint technology, the unlock takes only 0.4 seconds. 3D fingerprint technology provides a high-speed control possibility and ensures the security. Built-in, custom smart key function defines a whole new style of touch.

overview.title: CPU
overview.text: Octa-core 2.3GHz processor with 16nm FinFET technology and 4GB LPDDR4 RAM allow to fulfill several tasks at the same time. CPU is equipped with i5 co-processor, which controls the sensors of Honor 8 and increases significantly the operational speed of Kirin 950 SoC by reducing the response times and prolonging the battery life. Rapid smart file processing system will provide a super-smooth user experience.

overview.title: Display
overview.text: 5.2-inch FHD display supports the technology of pixel-level contrast adjustment. Blue light filtering reduces eye strain and provides a safer, more comfortable viewing experience.

specification.title: Connectivity
text: USB 2.0 with USB Type C Interface
